00020 #ifndef _XENO_NUCLEUS_BHEAP_H
00021 #define _XENO_NUCLEUS_BHEAP_H
00022 
00023 #include <nucleus/compiler.h>
00024 #include <nucleus/assert.h>
00025 
00026 /* Priority queue implementation, using a binary heap. */
00027 
00028 typedef unsigned long long bheap_key_t;
00029 
00030 typedef struct bheaph {
00031     bheap_key_t key;
00032     unsigned prio;
00033     unsigned pos;
00034 } bheaph_t;
00035 
00036 #define bheaph_init(holder) do { } while (0)
00037 #define bheaph_key(holder)  ((holder)->key)
00038 #define bheaph_prio(holder) ((holder)->prio)
00039 #define bheaph_pos(holder)  ((holder)->pos)
00040 #define bheaph_lt(h1, h2)   ((h1)->key < (h2)->key ||     \
00041                              ((h1)->key == (h2)->key &&   \
00042                               (h1)->prio > (h2)->prio))
00043 
00044 typedef struct bheap {
00045     unsigned sz;
00046     unsigned last;
00047     bheaph_t *elems[1]; /* only padding, indexing starts at 1 */
00048 } bheap_t;
00049 
00050 #define DECLARE_BHEAP_CONTAINER(name, sz)       \
00051     struct {                                    \
00052         bheap_t bheap;                          \
00053         bheaph_t *elems[sz];                    \
00054     } name
00055 
00056 #ifdef CONFIG_XENO_OPT_DEBUG_BHEAP
00057 #define BHEAP_CHECK(heap)   XENO_BUGON(BHEAP, ((heap)->sz == 0))
00058 #else /* !CONFIG_XENO_OPT_DEBUG_BHEAP */
00059 #define BHEAP_CHECK(heap)   do { } while (0)
00060 #endif /* CONFIG_XENO_OPT_DEBUG_BHEAP */
00061 
00062 #define bheap_gethead(heap)                     \
00063 ({                                              \
00064     bheap_t *_bheap = &(heap)->bheap;           \
00065     BHEAP_CHECK(_bheap);                        \
00066     __internal_bheap_gethead(_bheap);           \
00067 })
00068 
00069 static inline bheaph_t *__internal_bheap_gethead(bheap_t *heap)
00070 {
00071     if (heap->last == 1)
00072         return NULL;
00073 
00074     return heap->elems[1];
00075 }
00076 
00077 static inline bheaph_t *bheaph_parent(bheap_t *heap, bheaph_t *holder)
00078 {
00079     const unsigned pos = holder->pos;
00080 
00081     return likely(pos > 1) ? heap->elems[pos / 2] : NULL;
00082 }
00083 
00084 static inline bheaph_t *bheaph_child(bheap_t *heap, bheaph_t *holder, int side)
00085 {
00086     const unsigned pos = 2 * holder->pos + side;
00087 
00088     return likely(pos < heap->last) ? heap->elems[pos] : NULL;
00089 }
00090 
00091 #define bheap_init(heap, sz) __internal_bheap_init(&(heap)->bheap, sz)
00092 
00093 static inline void __internal_bheap_init(bheap_t *heap, unsigned sz)
00094 {
00095     heap->sz = sz;
00096     heap->last = 1;
00097 }
00098 
00099 #define bheap_destroy(heap) __internal_bheap_destroy(&(heap)->bheap)
00100 
00101 static inline void __internal_bheap_destroy(bheap_t *heap)
00102 {
00103     heap->sz = 0;
00104     heap->last = 1;
00105 }
00106 
00107 static inline void bheap_swap(bheap_t *heap, bheaph_t *h1, bheaph_t *h2)
00108 {
00109     const unsigned pos2 = bheaph_pos(h2);
00110 
00111     heap->elems[bheaph_pos(h1)] = h2;
00112     bheaph_pos(h2) = bheaph_pos(h1);
00113     heap->elems[pos2] = h1;
00114     bheaph_pos(h1) = pos2;
00115 }
00116 
00117 static inline void bheap_up(bheap_t *heap, bheaph_t *holder)
00118 {
00119     bheaph_t *parent;
00120 
00121     while ((parent = bheaph_parent(heap, holder)) && bheaph_lt(holder, parent))
00122         bheap_swap(heap, holder, parent);
00123 }
00124 
00125 static inline void bheap_down(bheap_t *heap, bheaph_t *holder)
00126 {
00127     bheaph_t *left, *right, *minchild;
00128 
00129     for (;;) {
00130         left = bheaph_child(heap, holder, 0);
00131         right = bheaph_child(heap, holder, 1);
00132 
00133         if (left && right)
00134             minchild = bheaph_lt(left, right) ? left : right;
00135         else
00136             minchild = left ?: right;
00137 
00138         if (!minchild || bheaph_lt(holder, minchild))
00139             break;
00140 
00141         bheap_swap(heap, minchild, holder);
00142     }
00143 }
00144 
00145 #define bheap_insert(heap, holder)              \
00146 ({                                              \
00147     bheap_t *_bheap = &(heap)->bheap;           \
00148     BHEAP_CHECK(_bheap);                        \
00149     __internal_bheap_insert(_bheap, holder);    \
00150 })
00151 
00152 static inline int __internal_bheap_insert(bheap_t *heap, bheaph_t *holder)
00153 {
00154     if (heap->last == heap->sz + 1)
00155         return EBUSY;
00156 
00157     heap->elems[heap->last] = holder;
00158     bheaph_pos(holder) = heap->last;
00159     ++heap->last;
00160     bheap_up(heap, holder);
00161     return 0;
00162 }
00163 
00164 #define bheap_delete(heap, holder)              \
00165 ({                                              \
00166     bheap_t *_bheap = &(heap)->bheap;           \
00167     BHEAP_CHECK(_bheap);                        \
00168     __internal_bheap_delete(_bheap, holder);    \
00169 })
00170 
00171 static inline int __internal_bheap_delete(bheap_t *heap, bheaph_t *holder)
00172 {
00173     bheaph_t *lasth;
00174 
00175     if (bheaph_pos(holder) >= heap->last)
00176         return EINVAL;
00177 
00178     --heap->last;
00179     if (heap->last != bheaph_pos(holder)) {
00180         lasth = heap->elems[heap->last];
00181         heap->elems[bheaph_pos(holder)] = lasth;
00182         bheaph_pos(lasth) = bheaph_pos(holder);
00183         bheap_down(heap, lasth);
00184     }
00185 
00186     return 0;
00187 }
00188 
00189 #define bheap_get(heap)                         \
00190 ({                                              \
00191     bheap_t *_bheap = &(heap)->bheap;           \
00192     BHEAP_CHECK(_bheap);                        \
00193     __internal_bheap_get(_bheap, holder);       \
00194 })
00195 
00196 static inline bheaph_t *__internal_bheap_get(bheap_t *heap)
00197 {
00198     bheaph_t *holder = __internal_bheap_gethead(heap);
00199 
00200     if (!holder)
00201         return NULL;
00202 
00203     __internal_bheap_delete(heap, holder);
00204 
00205     return holder;
00206 }
00207 
00208 #endif /* _XENO_NUCLEUS_BHEAP_H */
